Patuawa Nathan acquitted of murder and manslaughter after stabbing brother Challas Nathan to death in their Auckland home https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/patuawa-nathan-acquitted-of-murder-and-manslaughter-after-stabbing-brother-challas-nathan-to-death-in-their-auckland-首页/IE7SPPDW3ZBQTNJLRTB7JVTRSM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/patuawa-nathan-acquitted-of-murder-and-manslaughter-after-stabbing-brother-challas-nathan-to-death-in-their-auckland-首页/IE7SPPDW3ZBQTNJLRTB7JVTRSM/ Craig KapitanChallas Nathan, 30, was stabbed twice with a butcher's knife. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 04:06:37 +0000 Patuawa Nathan, 20 (left), was on trial for murder in the High Court of Auckland, accused of having killed older brother Challas Nathan (right) at their Wattle Downs family home in October 2022. He was acquitted. Photos / Jason Oxenham / Facebook

Photo / Bevan Conley.
